mapper.select: select cr.id, u1.name as notePerson, cr.noteContent, cr.noteTime, u2.name as editPerson, cr.editTime, cr.editFlag, cr.clueId from tbl_clue_remark cr join tbl_user u1 on cr.notePerson = u1.id left join tbl_user u2 on cr.editPerson = u2.id where cr.clueId = #{clueId} order by cr.noteTime
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_clue_remark (id, notePerson, noteContent, noteTime, editFlag, clueId) values (#{id},#{notePerson},#{noteContent},#{noteTime},#{editFlag},#{clueId})
